(Simplified: 堑)
Chinese Definition:
Pictophonetic: 斬 indicates the sound; 土 (earth) conveys the meaning.
  • ⿱ Above to below
    • 斬 [ zhǎn ] to chop, to cut, to sever; to behead
    • 土 [ tǔ ] soil, earth; items made of earth
①防禦用的壕溝，護城河：塹壕。天塹。
②陷坑，亦喻挫折：喫一塹，長一智。
③挖掘：“環而塹之，及泉”。
(Simplified: 堑)
Chinese Definition:
Pictophonetic: 斬 indicates the sound; 土 (earth) conveys the meaning.
Hanzi: 堑

Main pronunciation 主要发音: qiàn

Other pronunciations 其它发音: Not exists.

Original meaning 本义: Meaning pit.

English senses 英语理解:

Usage example 用法举例: 天塹 tiān qiàn (natural moat)

Importance by frequency 常用频率:

Shuowen 说文解字: 阬也一曰大也從土斬聲

Character decomposition 字形分解 :
Compound 塹 from potters-clay 土 tǔ and phonetic chop (斩)斬 zhǎn simp 堑.

塹字的基本解释

塹
qiàn

塹
zàn

塹

均见“堑”。

塹字的汉语字典释义

[①]［qiàn］
［《廣韻》七豔切，去豔，清。］
亦作“壍1”。“堑1”的繁体字。
(1)沟壕。
(2)比喻挫折，困难。
(3)挖掘。
(4)堕入堑壕。
(5)借作“賤”。
[②]［jiàn］
［《字彙補》疾染切］
“堑2”的繁体字。
低下。

塹字的康熙字典解释

【丑集中】【土字部】　塹； 康熙笔画：14； 页码：页237第03
【唐韻】【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】?七豔切，音槧。【說文】坑也。　又遶城水也。【史記·秦記】塹山堙谷，千八百里。　一作壍。【史記·秦紀】壍河旁。【高祖本紀】深壍而守。　又作?。【司馬相如傳】隤牆塡?。

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［qiàn］
["Guangyun" Qi Yan cut, go Yan, Qing. ]
Also known as "壍1". "堑1" in traditional characters.
(1) Trenches.
(2) An analogy of frustration and difficulty.
(3) Excavation.
(4) Fall into the trench.
(5) Borrowed as "cheap".
[②]［jiàn］
["Zihuibu" disease and cut]
"堑2" in traditional characters.
low.
